name: Sniper Rush
summary: Immerse yourself in an epic action experience with your friends with our exciting first-person shooter. Get ready to embark on a limitless adventure in the sky and on the ground. This game will take you to an astonishing map where freedom of movement is absolute! Enjoy thrilling flights, sprint at full speed, and jump like never before thanks to an innovative hook that allows you to reach inaccessible places. Fun and excitement are guaranteed in this gravity-defying shooter! Are you ready for action?
